_gram:
({#Bramati, Bramyati, BrAmyati#},
{#baBrAma, aBramat, aBramIt, Bramizyati, BramituM#},
{#BrAMta#})
_meanings:
{@--3@} To go astray, stray, swerve,
deviate.

{@--5@} To totter, reel,
stagger, be in doubt or suspense, 
waver; <ls>Māl. 5. 20.</ls>

{@--7@} To
flicker, flutter, quiver, move 
unsteadily; {#cakzurBrAmyati#} <ls>Pt. 4. 78.</ls>

{@--1@} To cause to rove or 
wander, cause to revolve or turn round,
whirl round; {#Bramaya jaladAnaMBogarBAn#}
<ls>Māl. 9. 41.</ls>
